Avoid glare

For stationary or installed systems, people may need to avoid reflective and environmental glare.

Comment on this item

Mappings

Required abilityAccessibility characteristicSupport needed
VisualLightingAvoid

References

  • Reference: 5-4-2-b to avoid reflective glare
  • Reference: 5-4-2-c to avoid glare from excessive brightness (of material or surrounding)
